title: Sangamon County Department of Public Health
cleaned_text: Animal Control & Adoption Center Looking for Volunteers Animal Control & Adoption Center Looking for Volunteers Tonya Sandstrom / Friday, August 4, 2023 0 66 The Sangamon County Animal Control and Adoption Center (SCACAC) is excited to announce the return of volunteers to the facility.
